controls.resetInvisConfirm: This will reset all invisible/tracked markers to their default state (visible), are you sure?
controls.backupSave:
This will download a backup copy of all Witcher 3 Map settings.

The file will be saved as: __fileName__

Are you sure?
controls.backupHtmlFail: Sorry.  Restore is not possible.  This browser does not support HTML5 File APIs.

credits.botHelp: With help from __mcarver__, __Gerignak__ and the other __contributors__. Thanks to __designGears__ and __hhrhhr__ for map and asset extraction.
credits.botAssets: Witcher 3, logo, icons & map are the property of __cdpr__.
credits.popupCreated: Created by __untamed0__ and enhanced by __BaHTsIzBEdEvi__, with contributions from:
credits.popupbotHelp1: __mcarver__ (lead contributor) - Marker count, hash permalink improvements, backup/restore settings, numerous fixes etc.
credits.popupbotHelp2: __ankri__ - Ability to hide markers on right or double click
credits.popupbotHelp4: __msmorgan__ - Javascript and map data structure improvements
credits.popupbotHelp6: Thanks to the following people for contributions to improving the map data:

credits.popupcrowdin: Special thanks to __crowdin__ for letting us use their excellent translation editor.

misc.contribute: Work in progress! Help appreciated at __link1__ or __link2__.
misc.helpTranslate: Want to help or improve translations?
misc.portraitWarn: Note: the map is best viewed in landscape mode, tap to dismiss
misc.nsfwConfirm: This will change 'Brothel' to 'Love Interest', are you sure?
misc.nsfwUndo: Are you sure you want to go back?

abandoned.label: Abandoned Site
abandoned.desc: A place abandoned due to monster or bandit attacks. Once the danger is eliminated, it will fill with life once more

alchemy.label: Alchemy Supplies
alchemy.desc: Here you can buy alchemy ingredients

armourer.desc: Here you can craft armor, repair damaged equipment, dismantle equipment for parts or remove upgrades from sockets.

armourerstable.label: Armorer's Table
armourerstable.desc: Armorer's tables grant your gear increased armor for a limited duration.

banditcamp.label: Bandit Camp
banditcamp.desc: A group of dangerous bandits have made camp here.

barber.label: Barber
barber.desc: Visit barbers for a shave or a new haircut.

blacksmith.desc: Here you can craft weapons, repair damaged equipment, dismantle equipment for parts or remove upgrades from sockets.

boat.label: Boat
boat.desc: You can use boats to travel across bodies of water

grindstone.label: Grindstone
grindstone.desc: A blade sharpened here will deal more damage

guarded.label: Guarded Treasure
guarded.desc: A particularly powerful monster guards a valuable cache here

harbor.label: Harbor
harbor.desc: A place where you can find a boat, boats will respawn here

herbalist.label: Herbalist
herbalist.desc: Here you can buy alchemy ingredients.

hidden.label: Hidden Treasure
hidden.desc: A hidden cache of valuable goods
hidden.guarded: A hidden cache of valuable goods.

monsterden.label: Monster Den
monsterden.desc: Monster-infested location. A constant worry for those living nearby.

monsternest.label: Monster Nest
monsternest.desc: Destroy monster nests with Grapeshot or Dancing Star bombs.

notice.label: Notice Board
notice.desc: Here you can find monster contracts and announcements about matters of local concern

pid.desc: There's a person or a group of people here in need of assistance.
pid.label: Person(s) in Distress

pop.label: Place of Power
pop.desc: Draw from a Place of Power to gain a temporary bonus. The first time you draw from any Place of Power, you also receive 1 Ability Point

smugglers.label: Smugglers' Cache
smugglers.desc: Smuggled goods have been hidden here.

spoils.label: Spoils of War
spoils.desc: Search here for loot left behind after a battle or skirmish.
